video.title: Spider-Man and His Amazing Friends
video.synopsis: Joined by his friends Firestar and Iceman, the amazing Spider-Man swings into battle against New York City's most dangerous villains.

episodes.synopsis: The Green Goblin plans to unleash a formula on New York which will turn everyone into hideous creatures, and only Spiderman and friends can stop him.
episodes.title: Triumph of the Green Goblin

episodes.synopsis: Spiderman and Iceman must battle a Tyrannosaurus Rex created by Kraven the Hunter to save Firestar and foil Kraven's plan to take over New York City.
episodes.title: The Crime of All Centuries

episodes.synopsis: When Dr. Doom discovers an amulet that gives the finder incredible powers, it accidentally falls into the hands of the meek Mr. Frump.
episodes.title: The Fantastic Mr. Frump

episodes.synopsis: Sunfire's uncle is a sinister madman who plans to rule the world with the help of a Firemonster.
episodes.title: Sunfire

episodes.synopsis: When a meteorite falls from space, it creates giant bees which turn people into bee zombies.
episodes.title: Swarm

episodes.synopsis: Chameleon invites all of the Spiderfriends to a get-together in order to destroy them one by one. They all band together to defeat Chameleon.
episodes.title: Seven Little Superheroes

episodes.synopsis: When Electro creates a monster out of a video game, he traps Flash Thompson, Iceman, and Firestar inside the game.
episodes.title: Video Man

episodes.synopsis: Magneto holds a prison's employee hostage, demanding that the authorities release all the prisoners.
episodes.title: The Prison Plot

episodes.synopsis: Spiderman finds himself the star of a movie, but discovers that Mysterio created the film to trap Spiderman.
episodes.title: Spidey Goes to Hollywood

episodes.synopsis: Loki disguises himself as Thor and attacks New York with the use of two powerful gems.
episodes.title: Vengeance of Loki

episodes.synopsis: Mordred seeks his revenge on the Black Knight who must enlist The Spiderfriends to defeat Mordred.
episodes.title: Knights and Demons

episodes.synopsis: Kingpin gains control of Captain America's mind in order to steal a superweapon.
episodes.title: Pawns of the Kingpin

episodes.synopsis: The Spiderfriends must stop the Red Skull from carrying out an evil plot to start World War III.
episodes.title: The Quest for the Red Skull

episodes.synopsis: When Iceman begins to lose his powers, Spiderman uses a memory enhancement machine to discover how Iceman gained his abilities.
episodes.title: The Origin of the Iceman

episodes.synopsis: When the Shocker escapes from jail and injures Aunt May, Spiderman reflects on how he became a superhero to restore confidence and defeat The Shocker.
episodes.title: Along Came Spidey

episodes.synopsis: Spiderman saves the day when he attends an X-Men reunion and stops Juggernaut from destroying Charles Xavier.
episodes.title: A Firestar Is Born

episodes.synopsis: When Sandman discovers Spiderman's true identity and threatens to blackmail him, the Spiderfriends fool him.
episodes.title: Spider-Man Unmasked!

episodes.synopsis: Dracula abducts Firestar and takes her back to Transylvania, unaware that Spiderman and Iceman follow in the hope of rescuing Firestar.
episodes.title: The Bride of Dracula

episodes.synopsis: When the evil Gamesman plots to hypnotize all young people, Spiderman and his friends must foil his plan.
episodes.title: The Education of a Superhero

episodes.synopsis: Zoltan concocts a serum which gives him spider powers and frames Spiderman for several crimes.
episodes.title: Attack of the Arachnoid

episodes.synopsis: As Iceman, Spiderman and Firestar all work separately in a lab, the Beetle creates chaos.
episodes.title: The Origin of Spider-Friends

episodes.synopsis: When a spaceship from the future crashes on Earth, Spiderman and his friends must battle the alien.
episodes.title: Spidey Meets the Girl from Tomorrow

episodes.synopsis: A cyborg uses a computer to seek revenge on Firestar and to test the fears and weaknesses of the X-Men and the Spiderfriends.
episodes.title: The X-Men Adventure

episodes.synopsis: The Spiderfriends must save a security satellite manipulated by Lightwave, Iceman's half sister.
episodes.title: Mission: Save the Guardstar
